title: E. L. Doctorow - Novels, Short Stories & a Play (14 books)
description:
* * UPDATED * *


E. L. DOCTOROW (b. 1931) is an American author known internationally for his unique works of historical fiction.

This updated collection includes the novel ANDREW'S BRAIN, published in January 2014.


The following books were published by Random House and are in EPUB format (THE CITY OF GOD and THE MARCH are also in PDF):

* ALL THE TIME IN THE WORLD: NEW & SELECTED STORIES (2011)

* ANDREW'S BRAIN (2014)

* BILLY BATHGATE (1989)

* THE BOOK OF DANIEL (1971)

* THE CITY OF GOD (2000) -- EPUB + PDF

* DRINKS BEFORE DINNER (1979)

* HOMER AND LANGLEY (2009)

* LOON LAKE (1980)

* THE MARCH (2005) -- EPUB + PDF

* RAGTIME (1975)

* SWEET LAND STORIES (2004)

* THE WATERWORKS (1994)

* WELCOME TO HARD TIMES (1960)

* WORLD'S FAIR (1985)
